channel.title: Comments on: How Does A Tennis Tie-Break Work?
channel.description: Your secret weapon on the court.

item.title: By: Adam
item.dc:creator: Adam
item.description: I believe some information in the section "How Does The Serve Work In A Doubles Tie-Breaker?" is incorrect: During regular games in a set, doesn't every serving double player always start their game "on the deuce side"? I believe the labels "on the deuce side" / "on the ad side" were meant to be in the second and not the first bullet point list of that section, i.e. once the tie-breaker begins.
item.content:encoded: I believe some information in the section “How Does The Serve Work In A Doubles Tie-Breaker?” is incorrect: During regular games in a set, doesn’t every serving double player always start their game “on the deuce side”?
